Peace.Name: Dmitry Andreyevich Muratov
Peace.Data:
Born: 30 November 1960, Kubyshev, USSR (now Samara, Russia)
Residence at the time of the award: Russia
Peace.Motivation: For their efforts to safeguard freedom of expression, which is a precondition for democracy and lasting peace

Peace.Name: Maria Ressa
Peace.Data:
Born: 2 October 1963, Manila, Philippines
Residence at the time of the award: Philippines
Peace.Motivation: For their efforts to safeguard freedom of expression, which is a precondition for democracy and lasting peace

Peace.Name: World Food Programme (WFP)
Peace.Motivation: For its efforts to combat hunger, for its contribution to bettering conditions for peace in conflict-affected areas and for acting as a driving force in efforts to prevent the use of hunger as a weapon of war and conflict

Peace.Name: Abiy Ahmed Ali
Peace.Data:
Born: 15 August 1976, Beshasha, Ethiopia
Role: Prime Minister of the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia
Peace.Motivation: For his efforts to achieve peace and international cooperation, and in particular for his decisive initiative to resolve the border conflict with neighbouring Eritrea

Peace.Name: Denis Mukwege
Peace.Data: Born: 1 March 1955, Bukavu, Belgian Congo (now Democratic Republic of the Congo)
Peace.Motivation: For their efforts to end the use of sexual violence as a weapon of war and armed conflict

Peace.Name: Nadia Murad Basee Taha
Peace.Motivation: For their efforts to end the use of sexual violence as a weapon of war and armed conflict
